data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eardley, Connal (2018): Taxonomic revision of the sub-Saharan Anthidiellum Cockerell (Apoidea: Megachilidae: Anthidiini). Zootaxa 4402 (2): 201-250, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4402.2.1|73 occurrences
